pull.title: guix: bump time-machine to efc26826400762207cde9f23802cfe75a737963c
pull.body:
Needed for https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/30210. This doesn't switch runtimes, because upstream is
still configured to use the old runtime. See:
https://git.savannah.gnu.org/cgit/guix.git/commit/?id=17188be0f723e00377b21b767f5447d7938a116e.

git-mimimal `2.45.1` -> `2.45.2`
Kernel Headers `6.1.92` -> `6.1.100`
LLVM `18.1.6` -> `18.1.8`
mingw-w64 `11.0.1` -> `12.0.0`
NSIS `3.09` -> `3.10`
patch `2.7.6` -> `2.7.6-0.f144b35`

[`eb6cf1ef328ac8b8...`](https://drahtbot.space/guix/bitcoin/bitcoin/8d573611575c3fa66f08407aa9b02f91b29a94c3/bitcoin-8d573611575c.tar.gz) | [`729195645c85b8d3...`](https://drahtbot.space/guix/bitcoin/bitcoin/b7b271c2f4cb7d9fba7923d2ce383425839fcc18/bitcoin-b7b271c2f4cb.tar.gz) | | guix_build.log | [`568371e366c44926...`](https://drahtbot.space/guix/bitcoin/bitcoin/8d573611575c3fa66f08407aa9b02f91b29a94c3/guix_build.log) | [`72be752ea73c6b91...`](https://drahtbot.space/guix/bitcoin/bitcoin/b7b271c2f4cb7d9fba7923d2ce383425839fcc18/guix_build.log) | | guix_build.log.diff | | [`fb579b03dbb83923...`](https://drahtbot.space/guix/bitcoin/bitcoin/b7b271c2f4cb7d9fba7923d2ce383425839fcc18/guix_build.log.diff) |

This is the problematic commit: https://github.com/mingw-w64/mingw-w64/commit/9a80e57890f887afd60e0b019d1c6698351fd470. Which, by no-longer using it's internal definitions, causes GCC to reach for intrinsics , which left a (different per arch) path to the `/gnu/store/` in the debug info. This pointed out a different issue, which is that the path was to GCC 11 libs, rather than 12. I'll open a new PR to fix winpthreads being compiled with 11 rather than 12, and then come back here.
Rebased for #30511. This is still non-deterministic, but the non-deterministic behaviour is no-longer buggy.

verification.payload:
tree 8b755306b7da11cd3495bb23029658714f996822
parent 1e8d689e01643cf6af5ab049d3296d3df73536e3
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1721401862 +0100
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1721982647 +0100

guix: patch /gnu/store paths out of winpthreads

At the same time, align the docs for all patches that do the same thing.

events.message:
guix: patch /gnu/store paths out of winpthreads

At the same time, align the docs for all patches that do the same thing.
